tasks.instruction:
Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for the AI-powered "Core Engine" MVP. The PRD should include:

1. Detailed feature specifications for all 7 MVP goals:
   - Modular API & Plugin System with JSON/YAML manifest schema
   - Pluggable AI Agent Framework for LLM integration
   - Course-Centric Intelligence "Live Map" system
   - Resource, Media, & Project Management
   - Basic Workflow Automation with builder interface
   - Clean Front-End Dashboard with specified pages
   - Production-Ready Practices and deployment requirements

2. Technical requirements and constraints:
   - Tech stack: Next.js frontend, FastAPI backend, PostgreSQL database
   - Docker containerization requirements
   - Authentication and security specifications
   - Plugin manifest format and loading system
   - AI agent orchestration requirements

3. User stories and acceptance criteria for each major feature
4. API specifications and data models
5. Plugin integration requirements for Canvas, GitHub, Google Drive
6. Workflow automation examples and requirements
7. UI/UX specifications for dashboard, course map, resource vault, workflow studio

Save the PRD as a markdown file at /workspace/docs/prd.md for the architect to reference.
